page.title: 20TOURIST INFORMATION
page.content: The Tourist Information Centre and Museum are located in the Square. The Tourist Centre covers the Highland's highest village and surrounding area including the Distilleries on the Whisky Trail. The Centre has various leaflets on things like ski-ing, fishing, pony trekking, accommodation and local events like the Highland Games. The Museum has a replica kitchen from the olden days and also has various exhibits connected with things like peat cutting, local landscape and wildlife, and local history. Over the summer months many visitors call at the Tourist Information Centre and Museum and take advantage of the excellent facilities available.
